ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Gives you some protection from damage early.
ItemTooltips.slippers: Gives you more damage so you can last hit better.
ItemTooltips.boots: Everyone needs boots to run faster.
ItemTooltips.flask: Allows you to heal up fast when you are low on HP.
ItemTooltips.tango: Use these to heal up minor damage you take.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Gives you DPS, exactly what you need. Keep them on agility (green) unless you need more HP put them on strength (red).
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Gives you more bashes and lots of damage. The extra bashes will help keep enemies from running.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: Gives you tons of DPS as well as evasion.
ItemTooltips.greater_crit: Crits for massive amounts of damage.
ItemTooltips.manta: Gives nice stats and your illusions will do good damage.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Gives lifeseal f you need it, remember it does not stack with Desolator.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: Gives tons of attack speed, good for pushing.
ItemTooltips.skadi: Great stats and keep the enemy from running, remember it does not stack with Desolator but will stack with lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.yasha: Gives you good damage and attack speed as well as makes you run faster.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: Gives you good early stats and some Mana regen.

AbilityTooltips.sniper_shrapnel: Not a very strong spell, best used in team fights and for hurting towers.
AbilityTooltips.sniper_headshot: Allows you to stun enemies, gives good damage throughout the game.
AbilityTooltips.sniper_take_aim: Allows you to attack from a safer distance so max it first.
AbilityTooltips.sniper_assassinate: A powerful long range nuke, use it to kill fleeing enemies, also it has a low cool-down so use it often.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: You can get some points in this early if you need more stats, otherwise just wait until you have to.
